name: After life (FlamingoSchool)
description:
Help an old man find the key to his inheritance.

A young man wakes up inside a hut in an unknown island, outside he meets a panicked old man. The old man cries about his key and how it cannot be lost, and begs for the young man's help.

Features

  • Narrative-based, singleplayer, adventure game;
  • Simple puzzles;
  • Backtracking
  • A fishing system;
  • Two different endings;

Controls (Keyboard)

Movement: WASD or Arrow keys

Interact: Z or J

Staring

  • Tiago Pereira - Game Designer
  • Tiago Sá - Game Artist
  • Victor Gonçalves - Game Programmer
